name: UP901386 - Duck In
description:
A lovely couple are out on a calm boat ride to feed some ducks. All seems fine until the ducks you feed start cloning themselves through mitosis!? If that isn't bad enough they've also become strong enough to evaporate our lovely couple from existence! However they can't just leave until they get rid of all that nearly gone off bread they brought with them. Wait, A new crazy development? Oh, god the bread they brought with them is an endless supply!? I guess they're stuck in this perpertual duck feeding hell forever or until one of the ducks  painfully evaporate them out of existence. Well,  let's see how long they can surive this duck onslaught.

I have used these tutorials to help in the development of this game.
